readable.title: 2218609886_892dcd6915
readable.content: A man is sitting on the floor outside a door and his head on his chin . A man sits against a yellow wall wearing all black . A man wearing a dark blue hat sits on the ground and leans against a building . Man with black hat , coat , and pants sitting next to the door of a building . The man in the black hat is sitting on the floor beside the green door .
